Not sure where to share this for awareness so I post multiple places.I tried to use my amaze at Ueno family mart.I used human A amaze with paywave. Merchant said failedI used human b amaze with paywave. Merchant said failed.I used human A amaze with chip insert. Merchant said failed.Fed up I went on to pay with Suica. Success of course.After I left family mart  1 minute later I got notification human A amaze transaction went through. Amaze points credited lol.I hurriedly went back to the family mart but they kept claiming (luckily there was a chinese speaking cashier) that their credit card machine has no records of any recent transactions. Ask me to call my bank.I was only given a copy of a more detailed receipt which showed Suica transaction was successful by family mart.I immediately chat with amaze and they will raise an investigation. Amount is small at $15 and my best guess is merchant will not claim the credit card funds and it will be auto released after 7-14 days.Imagine if this had been a large transaction what would u do?
Im suprised anyone still use Amaze actually. I have ditch it long time back.
